answers.answer: If coffee or tea causes nausea, then suggest avoid drinking it. Recommend you go to your MD to determine if you are deficient of any nutrients, vitamins, or minerals. If you are, then the MD can treat it properly. Thank you for your question.
thanks.  can I macrobiotic, paleo, or low carb diet help me?  where do I get information on that please?

question: Thanks for your help!  I am getting nausea from drinking several cups of coffee or black tea.  Do I need to avoid caffeine?I also have terrible memory/focus problems, chronic fatigue, low testosterone, low cortisol, high blood sugar/diabetes T2- what kind of diet should I follow?
title: Coffee Nausea and Diabetes diet
